title: Letters of James Joyce
description: Vol. I first revised edition, vol. II and III first editions, second printings 1967 . These three volumes, containing more than 1500 letters, comprise Joyce's collected correspondence. Volume I edited and with an introduction by Stuart Gilbert. Volumes II and III edited and introduced by Joyce's biographer Richard Ellman. All three volumes are illustrated, volume one with a frontispiece and facsimiles of Joyce's handwriting, and volumes II and III with more than fifty pages of halftones, largely from unpublished or unfamiliar photographs. Includes a chronology of Joyce's life and writings and an index of the letters. 440; lxxii,472; xxxi,584 pages. cloth, printed dust jacket, slipcase.. 8vo..
author: James Joyce
